thread.title: The star under the 5 stars in Paris
thread.title_full: The star under the 5 stars in Paris - Review of The Peninsula Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: beglhrnyc
title: The star under the 5 stars in Paris
text:
Peninsula in Paris is amazing. When you enter the lobby you are blown away. The Staff is very profesional, recognize you after the first step in this hotel.
Rooms are big and full of the newest tech.
The Service is more then 5 Stars.
The Breakfast is amazing, the service is top.
Rooftop Restaurant, maybe the best place to look over Paris.
I come back thats sure
